name: playproject
description: 1) Clone the repository using git clone https://gitlab.com/kaushi.mr/webdriverio.git 2) Open Visual Studio Code Ide and open the cloned project 3) Install all the dependencies using npm i 4) Open the terminal. 5) To execute the feature file in the terminal, run the npm command npm run test 6) Once the test is executed, to generate and view the allure report, run the npm command  npm run allure-reports
author: Anil
